verses.1: Papuru, Tsiriwanu meta Timuteu, tekanixewairitiaka tetsarunikatari xemiyutixexeiriwa Kakaiyari mita'ukiyari hetsie xetewiyati, Ti'aitame Ketsutsi Kiritsitu hetsie xetewiyati.
verses.2: Kakaiyari mita'ukiyari, Ketsutsi Kiritsitu miti'aitame, 'aixia mekete'u'iyarini xe- hetsiemieme, mekexepitiaka yu'iyaritsie xemika'uximatiariekaki.
verses.3: Neuxei 'iwamarixi, kaneuyeweka tame taheyemeki pamipariyutsi temipitiakaki Kakaiyari xehepaitsita, kemireuyewetse yatemiteyuriekaki xeme keyuri xemite'erie xemitaweriyarimeki, meta yuxexuiti yunaiti xemitetamiiriyarimeki xeteyukanaki'erieti.
verses.4: 'Ayumieme tameri 'aixia te'utiyuati xehepaitsita yatekateniwakuxaxatiwani miki memiyutixexeiriwa Kakaiyari hetsie metewiyati, mipai teteniwakihiaweni, kexemite'uka'eniwa, yuri kexemite'erie mexi xetaweweiyariwa, mexi xe'uximatiarie, meta naime kexemi'itiarietiwe.
verses.5: Yaxe'itiariekaku kanimatsiikini Kakaiyari heitseriemeki kemiti'iniata 'itsikametiti, mipai xeteta'iniatsieme xemeta xekanimariwakakuni, xehetsie kemitinakeni 'axemu'uwaniki Kakaiyari tixe'aitiwametikaku, mipai mitiyiniki xetenikwineni xemeta.
verses.6: Kamitsi, Kakaiyari heitseriemeki katiniyuriemiki kemitiwapinirieni wa'uximatiati miki memixe'uximatia,
verses.7: xeme kemitixepinirieni xemeta xe'uxipitiati xemi'uximatiarie, yatati'uxipitiati tameta, kepauka matsiikiti mayani Ti'aitame Ketsutsi taheima 'akamieti, yuniuki tuayamete memitirikawi wahamatia 'akamieti, taipai merikaiyeti.
verses.8: Heitseriemeki kaniwaranutaxiriemiki miki memika'imate Kakaiyari, miki yamemikatekahu Tati'aitiwame Ketsutsi niukieya 'aixia manuyine hetsie.
verses.9: Miki mipai memi'anene ke- memite'anutaxiriyani, wahetsie tininakimiki memika'unarieniki yuheyemeki, Ti'aitame hixieya mekaxeiyati meta tirikaiyeti kemitimariwe meka'ixeiyati
verses.10: kepauka munuani, kaninuamikitsi wit- simitixeiyarieniki yuteiterima wahetsie tiwiyati, yunaiti yuri memite'uta'eri memihixiyaniki me'i'ixiarieti 'iya tukaritsie, mipai katiniyimiki yuri xemite'ita'eririki tita temitehekiatakai xehetsia.
verses.11: Mipai mitiyiniki, tekanitanenewieka taheyemeki, mipai mitixemaikaki xeme kemireuyewetse 'amuyeikaniki Kakaiyari xe'u'uwame 'ita'inieyu, naime kexemiteyurie yuri xete'erieti.
verses.12: Mipai tiyiyu, kemi'ane Tati'aitiwame Ketsutsi mihiki witsikatinixeiyariemiki xehetsie tiwiyati, xemeta witsixekatenixeiyariekuni Kiritsitu 'aixia mitiuka'iyariki.

verses.1: Hiki 'iwamarixi, Tati'aitiwame Ketsutsi Kiritsitu kemitinuani hepaitsita meta hetsiana ketemitekuxeiriyani, mipai tepitexewawirie,
verses.2: yapauka xepikaheuyuyexiriwani yumu'utsie meta xepikamamaka hipame kemitiyini niukiyariki, yatini xewiti mipai tikuxatakaku, yatini xapa tahetsia kename miemeki, mipai 'ayetaineme: «Ti'aitame tukarieya paye'ari».
verses.3: Xepikatepitiaka nikahirixia xewiti xe'ukwamana, kariki meri hipati Kakaiyari me'aye'unieti mekanakinikuni meta matsiikime kanayuyeitiamiki miki tewi 'axamitiyuruwame, kemi'ane mika'unarieni.
verses.4: Miki neye'uniekamiki kanitawe'eriekamiki naime Kakaiyari mititewa meta naime mirayexeiyarie,
